extendedInfo.description: StockChaos for Android is a Stock Portfolio manager that offers the following features:    - Dynamic chart with technical(SMA, EMA, BOLL, MACD, Ichimoku, ...)    - Screener (same as in Google Finance) to find stocks based on different criteria    - Price Alert Management (notification when price goes below/above a given price)    - Portfolio and Transaction Management (sync with Google Finance)    - News from Google Finance, Motley Fool Caps and Twitter    - Company Info / Financial    - Share updates on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIN similarly to StockTwits.Follow us on Twitter @stockchaos @chimplerMany Thanks to Fab L. (fountainhead1978) for his continuous feedback and suggestions to improve the application.

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: I have tried other apps, but this is my winner!. The only thing that will make it much better is to add the \"Bid & Ask\" data.  Thank you...
reviews.author: Cristobal Ulloa

reviews.title: Freezes Crashes.  Still not fixed
reviews.comment: No news feed. Freezes my cell phone every time I use it.  It has become too annoying to use anymore.   Let me know when the problems are fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fails to sync with Google finance
reviews.comment: Ive contacted support via email about this issue over a month ago and have have had no response. This is very poor quality support.
reviews.author: Ernest Durda

reviews.title: Overall. Good
reviews.comment: Most bkk:Symbol from google finance cannot display chart...
reviews.author: Novice SNA

reviews.title: Update broke dividend info
reviews.comment: Great app, especially after the update before the most recent one. The latest update broke the dividend and yield reporting, which had been working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Had to downgrade the review
reviews.comment: I like it. But,  some things dont work anymore.  The screener,  the company info,  and the dividend yield are just a few of the problems.  Ive stated before,  id pay for this app for a little more revisions and general maintenence.  At this rate,  itll be down to a single star before long.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So many good features
reviews.comment: Sadly, not being update anymore. Need ui enhancement
reviews.author: Fadhli Dasril

reviews.title: Can\'t add Google account
reviews.comment: Kept trying and allowed access but it will not link.
reviews.author: Chuck Harris

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Wish there was an option to have app open directly in portfolio.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: News feed back
reviews.comment: Love the app. Glad they fixed broken news feed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: It\'s fixed
reviews.author: Glen Lawn

reviews.title: Cannot Fetch News
reviews.comment: Just tried this app.  Looks good, but News Feed does not work on Verizon Samsung Galaxy S3.    Also would be better to launch straight into \'Portfolio\', or whatever, based on a setting.  Would rate higher, if News Feed worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like the app, but...
reviews.comment: Stock splits are still not handled correctly and news feeds are now broken in the 1.2.5 update. I am confident the devs will fix soon. Keep up the good work guys!
reviews.author: Andrew R

reviews.comment: Good app - unfortunately, unable to load news data for last several days.\tSmooth, easy, concise. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy Tab 2
reviews.comment: Great app, but now will not link to Google Finance.

reviews.comment: Screener working with new update app back at been #1 ten stars from me

reviews.title: Good job!
reviews.comment: I don\'t normally leave comments but after playing around with this app I feel the developer really do deserve this 5 star rating. Cheers!

reviews.title: Screener issues
reviews.comment: One of the best stock apps I\'ve tried on market, only issue is screener seems to just hang on searching and never returns anything

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: I have alot of investment apps but this is one of my go to one\'s. Beats most paid apps. I would have paid for this in a heartbeat

reviews.title: Excellent
